title: A Matter of survival: toxic solvents

description: Produced in collaboration with the Safety Offices and the Chemical Research Laboratory of the Commonwealth Scientific and Industrial Research Organization. The danger of working in contact with benzine vapours. Safety precautions which should always be observed; avoid breathing the vapours; avoid spilling the liquid; replace stoppers in bottles; wash hands; always use the fume cupboard when pouring the liquid. The cumulative effects over a period of time can be fatal.
